----
const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    query: {
      bool: {
        must: [
          {
            match: {
              title: 'Search'
            }
          },
          {
            match: {
              content: 'Elasticsearch'
            }
          }
        ],
        filter: [
          {
            term: {
              status: 'published'
            }
          },
          {
            range: {
              publish_date: {
                gte: '2015-01-01'
              }
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
